body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/dvmdb/adom/{{adom}}/script",
            "data": [
                {
                    "script_schedule": null,
                    "name": "Cleanup",
                    "type": "cli",
                    "desc": "",
                    "content": "# Cleanup BGP and SD-WAN Configuration
config system sdwan
  unset status
  config service
    purge
  end
  config health-check
    purge
  end    
  config members
    purge
  end
end
config router bgp
  unset as 
  unset router-id 
  unset keepalive-timer 
  unset holdtime-timer 
  unset ibgp-multipath 
  unset network-import-check 
  unset additional-path 
  unset scan-time 
  config neighbor-range
    purge
  end
  config neighbor-group
    purge
  end
  config neighbor
    purge
  end
  config network
    purge
  end
  config vrf-leak
    purge
  end
end
",
                    "target": "device_database"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"OL_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 1$(dc-id)
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 2$(dc-id)    
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"OL_INET_11\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11
  next
  edit \"OL_INET_12\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_21\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 21
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_22\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 22
  next
end


# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_11\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_INET_12\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_21\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_22\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end
                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Routing-BGP",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
# BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.0.$(branch-id).1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.11.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_INET_11\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.12.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_INET_12\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.21.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_21\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.22.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_22\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.0.$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-BGP",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_0\"
    set vrf 1
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_0\"
    set vrf 2
  next
end

# Configure BGP neighbors
config router bgp
  set as 65000
  set router-id 10.$(dc-id).0.1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set network-import-check disable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"OL_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"OL_INET_0\"
      set update-source \"OL_INET_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"OL_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"OL_MPLS_0\"
      set update-source \"OL_MPLS_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.200.1$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"OL_INET\"
    next
    edit 2
      set prefix 10.200.2$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"OL_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/pkg/Branches-PP/firewall/policy/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Branch to INET",
                    "policyid": 1,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "underlay",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "utm-status": 1,
                    "ssl-ssh-profile": "certificate-inspection",
                    "application-list": "default",
                    "profile-protocol-options": "default",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Branch to Overlay",
                    "policyid": 2,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "overlay",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Overlay to Branch",
                    "policyid": 3,
                    "srcintf": "overlay",
                    "dstintf": "vl_lan",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/pkg/DataCenter-PP/firewall/policy/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "DC to INET",
                    "policyid": 1,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "port1",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Overlay to INET",
                    "policyid": 2,
                    "srcintf": "OL_MPLS",
                    "dstintf": "port1",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Overlay to Overlay",
                    "policyid": 3,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Health-Check",
                    "policyid": 4,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": "any",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "HC",
                    "service": "PING",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 3
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-DC",
                    "script": "# DC Connectivity
                    
# Inter-vrf interfaces
config system settings
  set allow-subnet-overlap enable
end
config system vdom-link
  edit \"vrf1_link\"
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link\"
  next
end
config system interface
  edit \"vrf1_link0\"
    set ip 10.200.99.10 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf1_link1\"
    set vrf 1
    set ip 10.200.99.11 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link0\"
    set ip 10.200.99.20 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link1\"
    set vrf 2
    set ip 10.200.99.21 255.255.255.254
  next
end
config system zone                                                                                                                                                                            
  edit \"InterVRF_LAN\"                                                                                                                                                                       
    set interface \"vrf2_link0\" \"vrf1_link0\"                                                                                                                                               
  next      
  edit \"InterVRF_WAN\"                                                                                                                                                                       
    set interface \"vrf2_link1\" \"vrf1_link1\"                                                                                                                                               
  next                                                                                                                                                                                    
end

# Leak route-map
config router prefix-list
  edit \"CORP_LAN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
        set ge 24
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit \"WAN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-address \"CORP_LAN\"
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NONE\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
end

# Leak Spokes' BGP routes to VRF=0
config router bgp
  config vrf-leak
    edit \"1\"
      config target
        edit \"0\"
          set route-map \"WAN\"
          set interface \"vrf1_link1\"
        next
      end
    next
    edit \"2\"
      config target
        edit \"0\"
          set route-map \"WAN\"
          set interface \"vrf2_link1\"
        next
      end
    next
    edit \"0\"
      config target
        edit \"1\"
          set route-map \"NONE\"
          set interface \"vrf1_link0\"
        next
        edit \"2\"
          set route-map \"NONE\"
          set interface \"vrf2_link0\"
        next
      end
    next
  end
end

config router static
  # Catch-all feasible route for DC-to-WAN return traffic
  edit 11
    set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
    set device \"vrf1_link0\"
  next
  edit 21
    set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
    set device \"vrf2_link0\"
  next
  # Leak DC subnets to WAN VRFs for WAN-to-DC traffic
  edit 12
    set dst 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    set device \"vrf1_link1\"
  next
  edit 22
    set dst 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    set device \"vrf2_link1\"
  next
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

exec: pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");

request.description: This interim policy install is a MUST when you run this collection in bulk (using Runner). That's because dynamic interfaces created later depend on the existence of some interfaces created before...

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-InterDC",
                    "script": "# DC-to-DC Connectivity
                    
# Configure hub-to-hub tunnel IPs
config system interface
  edit \"OL_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set ip 10.200.10.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
      set remote-ip 10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.252
  next
  edit \"OL_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set ip 10.200.20.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
      set remote-ip 10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.252
  next
end

# Configure prefix-list and route-map for local DC LAN
config router prefix-list
  edit \"LAN_DC$(dc-id)\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
        unset ge
        unset le
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-address \"LAN_DC$(dc-id)\"
      next
      edit 2
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"DC2DC_INET_IN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set set-local-preference 200
      next
    end
  next
end

# Configure hub-to-hub BGP peering
config router bgp
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set advertisement-interval 1
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set remote-as 65000
        set interface \"OL_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set route-map-in \"DC2DC_INET_IN\"
        set route-map-out \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    next
    edit \"10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set advertisement-interval 1
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set remote-as 65000
        set interface \"OL_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
        set route-map-out \"DC2DC_OUT\"
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

exec: pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");
pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Overlay-TS",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.11$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.11$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.12$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.12$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 11$(dc-id)
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 12$(dc-id)
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Overlay-TS",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 111
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 112
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 121
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
    set network-overlay enable
    set network-id 122
  next
end

# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

item.name: 1 - Add CLI Template - Spoke Routing TS

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-Routing-TS",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_111\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_INET_112\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_121\"
    set vrf 10
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_122\"
    set vrf 10
  next
end

# BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.111.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_INET_111\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.112.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_INET_112\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.121.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_MPLS_121\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.122.10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"TS_MPLS_122\"
        set remote-as 65000
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 101
      set prefix 10.0.10$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

item.name: 2 - Add CLI Template - Hub Routing TS

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-Routing-TS",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"TS_INET_0\"
    set vrf 11
  next
  edit \"TS_MPLS_0\"
    set vrf 12
  next
end

config router route-map
  edit \"DC_ACCESS\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-vrf 0
      next
      edit 2
        set match-vrf 1
      next
      edit 3
        set match-vrf 2
      next
    end
  next
end

# Configure BGP neighbors
config router bgp
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"TS_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"TS_INET_0\"
      set update-source \"TS_INET_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"TS_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 65000
      set interface \"TS_MPLS_0\"
      set update-source \"TS_MPLS_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 11
      set prefix 10.200.11$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"TS_INET\"
    next
    edit 12
      set prefix 10.200.12$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"TS_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
      set route-map \"DC_ACCESS\"
    next
  end
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

}

item.name: 2 - Add FGTs to Regional VPN Communities

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/vpnmgr/node",
            "data": [
                {
                    "protected_subnet": {
                        "addr": "all",
                        "seq": 1
                    },
                    "scope member": {
                        "name": "{{name_fgt_dc}}",
                        "vdom": "root"
                    },
                    "vpntable": "R1_INET",
                    "role": 0,
                    "iface": "port1",
                    "hub_iface": [],
                    "peer": [],
                    "automatic_routing": 0,
                    "mode-cfg": 1,
                    "mode-cfg-ip-version": 0,
                    "ipv4-start-ip": "10.200.11.1",
                    "ipv4-end-ip": "10.200.11.9",
                    "ipv4-netmask": "255.255.255.0",
                    "net-device": 0,
                    "tunnel-search": 1,
                    "extgwip": [],
                    "extgw_hubip": [],

item.name: 4 - Add Hubs to Inter-Region VPN Community

exec: pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");

request.description: This interim policy install is a MUST when you run this collection in bulk (using Runner). That's because dynamic interfaces created later depend on the existence of some interfaces created before...

exec: pm.expect(0).to.equal(1, "Timeout while waiting for task completion");

request.description: This interim policy install is a MUST when you run this collection in bulk (using Runner). That's because dynamic interfaces created later depend on the existence of some interfaces created before...

body.raw:
{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-DualRegion-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Hub
                    
# Configure tunnel interface IPs
config system interface
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.1$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).10 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.2$(dc-id).254 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set ip 10.200.10.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set ip 10.200.20.$(dc-id) 255.255.255.255
    set remote-ip 10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id) 255.255.255.0
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
  next
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
  next
  edit \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set auto-discovery-forwarder enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
  edit \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set auto-discovery-sender enable
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set auto-discovery-forwarder enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
end

                    "
                },
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-DualRegion-Overlay",
                    "script": "# Adjust Overlay on Branch
                    
# Enable ADVPN
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set auto-discovery-receiver enable
    set idle-timeout enable
    set idle-timeoutinterval 5
  next
end

# Allow shortcut monitoring (ping)
config system interface
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
  edit \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set allowaccess ping
  next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Spoke-DualRegion-Routing-BGP",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Spoke
                    
# BGP to Hub
config router bgp
  set as 6500$(branch-id)
  set router-id 10.0.$(branch-id).1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.1$(branch-id).10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
        set remote-as 6500$(branch-id)
        set additional-path receive
    next
    edit \"10.200.2$(branch-id).10\"
        set soft-reconfiguration enable
        set interface \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
        set remote-as 6500$(branch-id)
        set additional-path receive
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.0.$(branch-id).0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Configure remote region's overlay reachability
config router static
  edit 10
    set dst 10.200.0.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R$(branch-id)_INET_0\"
  next
  edit 20
    set dst 10.200.16.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R$(branch-id)_MPLS_0\"
  next
end

                    "
                }                
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-DualRegion-Routing-BGP",
                    "script": "# Dynamic Routing on Hub
                    
# Configure VRFs
config system interface
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
    set vrf 1
  next
  edit \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set vrf 1
  next
  edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
    set vrf 2
  next
  edit \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
    set vrf 2
  next
end

# Configure BGP neighbors
config router bgp
  set as 6500$(dc-id)
  set router-id 10.$(dc-id).0.1
  set keepalive-timer 5
  set holdtime-timer 15
  set ibgp-multipath enable
  set network-import-check disable
  set additional-path enable
  set scan-time 20
  config neighbor
    edit \"10.200.10.$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 6500$(remote-dc-id)
      set interface \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set update-source \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set attribute-unchanged next-hop
      set ebgp-enforce-multihop enable
    next
    edit \"10.200.20.$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 6500$(remote-dc-id)
      set interface \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set update-source \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
      set attribute-unchanged next-hop
      set ebgp-enforce-multihop enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-group
    edit \"R$(dc-id)_INET\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 6500$(dc-id)
      set interface \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
      set update-source \"R$(dc-id)_INET_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
    edit \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS\"
      set soft-reconfiguration enable
      set advertisement-interval 1
      set remote-as 6500$(dc-id)
      set interface \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
      set update-source \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS_0\"
      set additional-path both
      set route-reflector-client enable
    next
  end
  config neighbor-range
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.200.1$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"R$(dc-id)_INET\"
    next
    edit 2
      set prefix 10.200.2$(dc-id).0 255.255.255.0
      set neighbor-group \"R$(dc-id)_MPLS\"
    next
  end
  config network
    edit 1
      set prefix 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    next
  end
end

# Configure remote region's overlay reachability
config router static
  edit 10
    set dst 10.200.0.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R1R2_INET_1$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
  edit 20
    set dst 10.200.16.0 255.255.240.0
    set device \"R1R2_MPLS_2$(remote-dc-id)\"
  next
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/cli/template",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Hub-DualRegion-Routing-DC",
                    "script": "# DC Connectivity
                    
# Inter-vrf interfaces
config system settings
  set allow-subnet-overlap enable
end
config system vdom-link
  edit \"vrf1_link\"
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link\"
  next
end
config system interface
  edit \"vrf1_link0\"
    set ip 10.200.99.10 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf1_link1\"
    set vrf 1
    set ip 10.200.99.11 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link0\"
    set ip 10.200.99.20 255.255.255.254
  next
  edit \"vrf2_link1\"
    set vrf 2
    set ip 10.200.99.21 255.255.255.254
  next
end
config system zone                                                                                                                                                                            
  edit \"InterVRF_LAN\"                                                                                                                                                                       
    set interface \"vrf2_link0\" \"vrf1_link0\"                                                                                                                                               
  next      
  edit \"InterVRF_WAN\"                                                                                                                                                                       
    set interface \"vrf2_link1\" \"vrf1_link1\"                                                                                                                                               
  next                                                                                                                                                                                    
end

# Leak route-map
config router prefix-list
  edit \"CORP_LAN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set prefix 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
        set ge 24
      next
    end
  next
end
config router route-map
  edit \"WAN\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set match-ip-address \"CORP_LAN\"
      next
    end
  next
  edit \"NONE\"
    config rule
      edit 1
        set action deny
      next
    end
  next
end

# Leak Spokes' BGP routes to VRF=0
config router bgp
  config vrf-leak
    edit \"1\"
      config target
        edit \"0\"
          set route-map \"WAN\"
          set interface \"vrf1_link1\"
        next
      end
    next
    edit \"2\"
      config target
        edit \"0\"
          set route-map \"WAN\"
          set interface \"vrf2_link1\"
        next
      end
    next
    edit \"0\"
      config target
        edit \"1\"
          set route-map \"NONE\"
          set interface \"vrf1_link0\"
        next
        edit \"2\"
          set route-map \"NONE\"
          set interface \"vrf2_link0\"
        next
      end
    next
  end
end

config router static
  # Catch-all feasible route for DC-to-WAN return traffic
  edit 11
    set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
    set device \"vrf1_link0\"
  next
  edit 21
    set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
    set device \"vrf2_link0\"
  next
  # Leak DC subnets to WAN VRFs for WAN-to-DC traffic
  edit 12
    set dst 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    set device \"vrf1_link1\"
  next
  edit 22
    set dst 10.$(dc-id).0.0 255.255.255.0
    set device \"vrf2_link1\"
  next
end

                    "
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/pkg/Branches-PP/firewall/policy/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "Branch to INET",
                    "policyid": 1,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "underlay",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "utm-status": 1,
                    "ssl-ssh-profile": "certificate-inspection",
                    "application-list": "default",
                    "profile-protocol-options": "default",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Branch to Overlay",
                    "policyid": 2,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "overlay",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Overlay to Branch",
                    "policyid": 3,
                    "srcintf": "overlay",
                    "dstintf": "vl_lan",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "set",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "/pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/pkg/DataCenter-PP/firewall/policy/",
            "data": [
                {
                    "name": "DC to INET",
                    "policyid": 1,
                    "srcintf": "vl_lan",
                    "dstintf": "port1",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "nat": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Overlay to Overlay",
                    "policyid": 2,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS",
                        "R1R2_INET",
                        "R1R2_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS",
                        "R1R2_INET",
                        "R1R2_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "all",
                    "service": "ALL",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 2
                },
                {
                    "name": "Health-Check",
                    "policyid": 3,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": "any",
                    "srcaddr": "all",
                    "dstaddr": "HC",
                    "service": "PING",
                    "action": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "schedule": "always",
                    "logtraffic": 3
                },
{
                    "name": "DC - WAN VRF",
                    "policyid": 4,
                    "srcintf": [
                        "InterVRF_WAN",
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS",
                        "R1R2_INET",
                        "R1R2_MPLS"
                    ],
                    "dstintf": [
                        "InterVRF_WAN",
                        "OL_INET",
                        "OL_MPLS",
                        "R1R2_INET",
                        "R1R2_MPLS"
                    ],
